attributes.action: Do not close Tier 1 (General) Visa Extension on 6 April 2015
attributes.additional_details:
The Government is proposing changes to close Tier 1 (General) extension on 6 April 2015, if this is passed then a large majority of Tier 1 visa holders will be affected who could not accumulate the continuous residence period by April 2015 that is required to settle permanently in the UK. (via ILR)

I strongly believe a lot of Tier 1 visa holders will benefit if the closure is not implemented for the next 2 years (atleast) in order to allow a wider community to become eligible to settle permanently in the UK.

Please sign this petition today if you believe the Tier 1 Extension should not be closed in April 2015.

Thank You
